name: EvenMoreLevelTags
description: Adds even more level tags based on a level's traits.

robsVault.name: Enable for RobsVault
robsVault.description:
Show level tags on levels under the RobsVault account.

<cp>This is</c> <cr>NOT <cp>recommended,</c> <cy>as levels under the RobsVault account name will show EVERY level tag regardless of the level's traits.</c>

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
